author: @nillionnetwork
text:
It's been a week at Nillion with lots of shipping!

From announcing our biggest upgrade to releasing nilGPT and LouisAI.

A quick recap to wrap up the week 👇 https://t.co/mOSMKDoz6k

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Introducing LouisAI - a private meeting notetaker app!

Built on Nillion, the app gives you meeting and call summaries while protecting your privacy.

400 @Nillioneco followers will get early access via DM.

Learn more 👇 https://t.co/1pSzOVKKLS

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Talking about Nillion just got even better.

From now until July 14th, the top 20 engagers on the Fantasy Top leaderboard will each earn a Lootbox.

Crack the top 10 and you'll secure a @wearebloopers WL spot.

Back to work! https://t.co/UG22olp3ez
